item_name: SONY HT-S20R SOUNDBAR HOME THATER SURROUND 5.1CH BLUETOOTH 400W
item_desc:
SONY HT-S20R

Barang baru segel dan 100% Original 
bergaransi sony indonesia 1 tahun syarat dan ketentuan berlaku.

Chat admin mengenai pengiriman surabaya dan ongkir diluar surabaya .



For unforgettable movie moments
Get the best seat in the house. A sound bar, subwoofer and rear speakers create authentic surround sound, while 400W power output and Dolby® Digital technology help put you right at the heart of all your favourite movies.

Fitur Utama :
- Fill the room with 5.1ch real surround sound
- Easy Bluetooth® connectivity for music streaming
- USB audio playback
- Simple set-up with HDMI ARC, optical, and analogue inputs
- Sound modes for enhanced movies and music

Spesifikasi :
- POWER OUTPUT (TOTAL) : 400W
- AMPLIFIER CHANNELS : 5.1ch
- MAIN UNIT SIZE – BODY ONLY (W X H X D) : 760x52x86mm
- SUBWOOFER SIZE (W X H X D) : 192x387x342mm
- MAIN UNIT WEIGHT – BODY ONLY : 2.0kg
- SUBWOOFER WEIGHT : 6.9kg
- SUBWOOFER TYPE : Wired
- OPTICAL INPUT : Dolby Digital,Dolby Dual mono,LPCM 2ch
- USB : WAV,MP3,WMA
- BLUETOOTH VERSION : 5.0
- NUMBER OF INPUT/OUTPUT : Input / Output: 0 / 1 (ARC)
- BRAVIA SYNC : Yes
- HDMI CEC : Yes
